gsetting.title: Enable Third Party Extensions
gsetting.subtitle: Third party extensions are not supported by stillOS and may cause unforeseen issues. stillOS modifies GNOME Shell, so not every extension will work properly. Some third-party extensions may also randomly break after stillOS updates.

gsetting.title: Show System Extensions (Advanced)
gsetting.subtitle:
ONLY DO THIS IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING!!

These extensions are used by stillOS's UI. Disabling them or changing settings may cause problems.
